name: GitFit
description:
Very special thanks to Lightvgm (https://austinlight.itch.io/), who created the game's main music track and played a big part in making the game better.

After the long  quarantine, speedwalks are taking revenge on humans for them being too fat. You, joe, a reddit mod, are the last human to survive the attack, but not for long. How long will you survive? (write it in the comments).

Controls: any key on the keyboard.
